Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lake Shore/Oakwood

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted Northbound via: Lake Park, 47th, King Drive, and Michagan, due to, street blocakge, near Lake Shore/Oakwood.
